title: NPC1
body:
Welcome to the forest
i need your help 
to cure the lake
find all 12 flowers to cure the lake
I will make a potion to do this
will you help?
[[ Yes: |Yes]]
[[ No: |No]]

title: NPC2
body:
You caused this
the lake is this way because of You
.

title: NPC3
body:
you need to help cure the lake
we the dryads will thank you for this
return once the lake is cured
.

title: NPC3 new
body:
thank you for curing the lake
.

title: NPC2 new
body:
I was wrong about you thank you
you and your kind are not that bad
as there must be others like you
.

title: NPC1 new
body:
Thank you for curing the lake
the forest will flourish now
thank you for your help
.

title: No
body:
if you feel like helping any way
just find the flowers
.
